name: Lazy property
help: Delegates.lazy() is a function that returns a delegate that implements a lazy property: the first call to get() executes the lambda expression passed to lazy() as an argument and remembers the result, subsequent calls to get() simply return the remembered result. If you want thread safety, use blockingLazy() instead: it guarantees that the values will be computed only in one thread, and that all threads will see the same value.
